snippet: Up to 150 people were gunned down in three locations, according to witnesses, in attacks by gunmen thought to be members of Boko Haram.
abstract: Nearly 150 people are killed in three attacks in northeast Nigeria by suspected Boko Haram gunmen.

byline.contributor: A correspondent for The New York Times contributed reporting from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Up to 150 people were gunned down in three locations, according to witnesses, in attacks by gunmen thought to be members of Boko Haram.

headline.main: Boko Haram Militants Suspected in Attacks at Mosques in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Is Suspected in Shootings at Mosques in Nigeria
